RelatedSentence: The Congress Monday took stock of its disappointing defeat in the Lok Sabha elections as party chief Sonia Gandhi and her son and party vice president Rahul Gandhi offered to step down owning responsibility , but the CWC unanimously rejected it .

An unsmiling Sonia Gandhi , speaking at a mammoth two - and - half hour long meeting of the Congress Working Committee , the party 's highest decision - making forum , described the Congress electoral drubbing as nirashajanak ( disappointing ) .
